item.title: Is there something wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @cant_touch_this93 cant touch this93
item.description:
@cant_touch_this93 wrote:

yeah lol…

//Playercount and server name at top of screen public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("@whi@ -[^_^]-@cya@A@ora@t@yel@o@whi@m@cya@i@ora@c@yel@S@dor@c@whi@a@gre@p@cya@e -[^_^]-", 6570); sendFrame126("@whi@N@cya@e@yel@E@red@b@yel@Z @yel@0@cya@n@whi@L@red@i@whi@N@yel@e: " + players, 6572); sendFrame126("@whi@Combat : " + combat, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673 }

just edit that too your liking

item.title: Is there something wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @andrew1234321 andrew1234321
item.description:
@andrew1234321 wrote:

[code]

//Playercount and server name at top of screen
public void writePlayers() {
if (reap == 1) {
isNpc = true;
npcId = 2862;
}

int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
sendFrame126("                    @whi@E@red@n@gre@r@cya@i@whi@t @red@v@gre@2@cya@.@whi@0", 6570);
sendFrame126("@yel@Owner=@whi@ Nate", 6572);
sendFrame126("   @red@Players On - " + players, 6664);
setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673

}[/code]

when i compile it says

client.java:122: cannot find symbol symbol : variable reap location: class client if (reap == 1) { ^

Read full topic
